guide.introduction: By purchasing the nicest faux fur you can find you can create a retro, Mad Men-style wrap that is animal-friendly.
guide.introduction_rendered:
By purchasing the nicest faux fur you can find you can create a retro, Mad Men-style wrap that is animal-friendly.

Tools
  • Lining fabric
  • Sewing machine
  • faux fur
  • heavy cotton or muslin for your pattern
  • hook & eye closure or ribbon

lines.text: Take some heavy cotton or muslin to create a pattern piece, or use the one I created: http://blog.craftzine.com/archive/2011/1...
lines.text_raw: Take some heavy cotton or muslin to create a pattern piece, or use the one I created: http://blog.craftzine.com/archive/2011/11/faux_fur_wrap_video.html

lines.text: Take your faux fur and place it with the nap of the fur facing down. Place your pattern piece on top and pin the perimeter. Cut the fur out with a utility knife.
lines.text_raw: Take your faux fur and place it with the nap of the fur facing down. Place your pattern piece on top and pin the perimeter. Cut the fur out with a utility knife.

lines.text: Choose a lining fabric that is a heavier cotton. Pin your newly cut faux fur to your lining fabric, good sides together, and sew the perimeter leaving a 1/4" seam allowance.
lines.text_raw: Choose a lining fabric that is a heavier cotton. Pin your newly cut faux fur to your lining fabric, good sides together, and sew the perimeter leaving a 1/4" seam allowance.

lines.text: Leave an unsewn gap and turn the piece right-side-out. Fold and pin the gap, then sew it closed.
lines.text_raw: Leave an unsewn gap and turn the piece right-side-out. Fold and pin the gap, then sew it closed.

lines.text: Add a hook and eye closure or a nice ribbon and rock your faux fur wrap.
lines.text_raw: Add a hook and eye closure or a nice ribbon and rock your faux fur wrap.

guide.summary: Real fur is unacceptable but faux fur is a great way to stay stylish and warm. You won't have to hurt any animals to create this luxurious piece that can wear all fall and winter long.
